import React, { useContext,useEffect ,useReducer} from 'react' import {CheckoutSteps} from "../components/CheckoutSteps" import {Row,Col, Card,Button,ListGroup, ListGroupItem} from "react-bootstrap" import {Store} from "../Store" import {Link,useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" const reducer=(state,action)=>{ switch(action.type) { case "CREATE_REQUEST": return {...state,loading:true} case "CREATE_SUCCESS": return {...state,loading:false} case "CREATE_FAIL": return {...state,loading:false} default:return state; } } const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const navigate=useNavigate(); const {state,dispatch:cxtDispatch}=useContext(Store); const {cart}=state; const round2=(num)=>Math.round(num*100+Number.EPSILON)/100; cart.itemPrice=round2(cart.cartItems.reduce((a,c)=>a+(c.price*c.quantity),0)); cart.shippingPrice=cart.itemPrice>100?round2(0):round2(10); cart.taxPrice=round2(cart.itemPrice*0.15); cart.totalPrice=round2(cart.itemPrice+cart.shippingPrice+cart.taxPrice); const placeOrderHandler=async()=>{ } useEffect(()=>{ if(!cart.paymentMethod) { navigate('/payment'); } },[navigate,cart.paymentMethod]) const []=useReducer(reducer,) return (

Preview Order

Shipping Name:{cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},{cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country} Edit Payment Method: {cart.paymentMethod} Edit Items {cart.cartItems.map(item=>( {item.name} {item.quantity} $ {item.price} ))} Edit Order Summary Items: ${cart.itemPrice.toFixed(2)} Shipping $ {cart.shippingPrice.toFixed(2)} Tax $ {cart.taxPrice.toFixed(2)} Order Total $ {cart.totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen;
